name: Huntswoman
firstNightReminder: Show the Huntswoman an in play outsider.
otherNightReminder: The Huntswoman might choose a player.  If that player was an outsider: Put the Huntswoman to sleep. Wake the outsider and show them the *YOU ARE* info token and their new character token.
ability: You start knowing an in play outsider. Once per game, at night*, choose a living player: an outsider, if chosen, becomes a not-in-play Townsfolk. [At Least 1 Outsider]
flavor: My cabin is warm and sturdy. My axe by the door, my boots drying by the fire, and elk stew a-simmering… Hark! A scream echoes through the valley! The rain and the mud and the cold, cold wind mask the scent of the wolves, but I know the path and my pace is steady. I am coming.

name: Storm Catcher
firstNightReminder: At the start of the night, announce the Courtier is stormcaught. If that character is in play, mark that player as *STORMCAUGHT*. :reminder: Wake each evil player and show them the character token, then the marked player.  If not in play, wake each evil player, show them the *THESE CHARACTERS ARE NOT IN PLAY* token and the relevant character token.
ability: If the Courtier is in play, they can only die by execution, but evil players learn which player they are.
flavor: At dawn, the temple’s long shadow creeps to the fountain. At dusk, the obelisk blocks the red glare, cooling warm water under the archway. All lines converge here. A storm is coming, and this, this pebbled and lush and holy place between the apple trees, is the eye.
